title: Augmentation of the NekMesh generator to provide quad-based meshes for 2D configurations
summary: This report focuses on the initial phase of work undertaken by King’s College London and Imperial College London to investigate challenges for generation of high-order meshes for the NEPTUNE project. In this third report that comprises Deliverable 1.2 of our workplan, we extend the two-dimensional high-order mesh generation process for producing meshes for the tokamak edge region to contain quadrilateral elements.
